verses.translation: 1. Abii lahab namma gaba finqiteh, kaadu usuk finqiteh.

verses.arabic_text: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: 2. Kay maaluy yedderee kee kay xaylo Kaah xiqtem maliiy yallih digaalak tu kaak ma çatta.
3. Usuk Кахха ura-le giray hadiidigta Culele.
4. Kaadu kay barray bocó takkuqih tani, girá kaâ luk culele.
5. Tet fıllat cambok yan akatay is jahannam giráh addal edde diggalsimta yan.
